edu.bpl.pwsplugin.acquisitionManagers.fileSavers

Class SaverThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • edu.bpl.pwsplugin.acquisitionManagers.fileSavers.SaverThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageSaver, java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImSaverRaw, MMSaver

    public abstract class SaverThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements ImageSaver
    A base class for an ImageSaver that operates in its own thread. Ideally it saves concurrently to the acquisition to save time. Each saverthread object is only good for one image, then a new instance must be created.

      • run

        public abstract void run()
        This runs in the separate thread and begins the saving process. Any needed arguments should have been passed to the `beginSavingThread` method. This should have a timeout
        Specified by:
